definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血壓及胃酸過多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期間禁用。

sentences.english: In these patients, she says, it’s not enough to quell the acid sloshing up from the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，僅僅抑制胃酸從胃部上湧是不夠的。

sentences.english: LKP didn't influence the secretion of gastric acid in rats and gastrointestinal peristalsis in mice.
sentences.chinese: 對大鼠胃酸分泌和小鼠胃腸蠕動未見明顯影響。

sentences.english: These secretory canaliculi are filled with acid.
sentences.chinese: 這些分泌小管內充滿了胃酸。

sentences.english: Or, could glyphosate contribute to stomach ulcers through increased acid production?
sentences.chinese: 或者，草甘膦能否通過增加胃酸的生產導致胃潰瘍？

sentences.english: TMG is not highly acidic and will not supplement low stomach acid.
sentences.chinese: 無水甜菜鹼不酸，不會補充低胃酸。

sentences.english: Conclusions Food types, gastric acid and gastric motility is the major affecting factors for gastrolithiasis.
sentences.chinese: 結論食物種類，胃酸和胃動力是形成胃石主要因素。

sentences.english: Betaine hydrochloride is a powerful lipotropic and increases gastric acid.
sentences.chinese: 鹽酸甜菜鹼是強大的抗脂肪肝物，並可增加胃酸。

sentences.english: This can help reduce acid reflux when sleeping, as gravity keeps the acid in the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 這樣利用重力的原理便可以減少胃酸倒流。

sentences.english: Food will cause your stomach to produce the acid.
sentences.chinese: 食物會使您的胃產生很多胃酸出來。

sentences.english: Hawthorn Fruit is sour in taste, especially good for those who has poor digestive system.
sentences.chinese: 山楂味酸甘，顧對消化不良或胃酸過多的人有幫助。

sentences.english: If the sphincter does not work properly, stomach acid flows into the oesophagus.
sentences.chinese: 如果括約肌不及時工作，胃酸就會進入食管。

sentences.english: Stomach acid is one of the most powerful corrosives.
Bacteria in food are killed by gastric juice and digestive enzymes.
sentences.chinese: 食物中的細菌會被胃酸及消化酶殺死。

sentences.english: H. pylori is resistant to gastric acid.
sentences.chinese: 幽門螺旋桿菌是耐胃酸的。

sentences.english: One theory is that suppressing stomach acid might interfere with the absorption of calcium.
sentences.chinese: 一種理論認爲抑制胃酸分泌可能會阻礙鈣的吸收。
